DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety preliminary effectiveness PDS 1.0 patient neovascular AMD .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Preliminary Efficacy Study PDS-1.0 Patients With Neovascular AMD
DOC.criteria: Key Diagnosis CNV secondary AMD confirm fluorescein angiography , previously treat Retinal thickness due edema least 300um study eye Best correct visual acuity 20/80 worse study eye Best correct visual acuity 20/40 good fellow eye Evidence scar CNV ( e.g . geographic atrophy ) study eye Fibrosis > 75 % lesion area study eye
